CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(DMS_Doc_Id__c) || Document_Check_Sesuai__c == TRUE || ((RIGHT( Document_Group__c , LEN("Application.DocCheck.LO")) == "Application.DocCheck.LO" && (Loan__r.Application__r.Legal_Opini_Approval_Id__r.Is_Current_LAO__c == FALSE || BEGINS(Loan__r.Application__r.Legal_Opini_Approval_Id__r.Approval_Assigned__c, $User.Id )))) || Loan__r.Loan_Status__c == "Survey (Data Correction)", "", HYPERLINK( "/lightning/action/quick/Document_BFI__c.Edit_Notes" & "?objectApiName&context=RECORD_DETAIL&recordId=" & CASESAFEID(Id) & "&backgroundContext=%2Flightning%2Fr%2FApplication__c%2F" & Loan__r.Application__c & "%2Fview&retUrl=", "Edit", "_self" ) )
CustomField.label: Action
